title: Daryl.Hall.Live.from.Daryl's.House.E59.Sharon.Jones.&.Allen.

Sharon Jones and Allen Stone

ones, who first appeared on Live from DarylÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s House in Sept. 2010, has made a name for herself with four independently released albums featuring her Dap-Kings band, including I Learned the Hard Way, recorded at their House of Soul Studios, which debuted at #15 on the Billboard charts when it was released on their own Daptone label. The Boston Globe raved that Jones Ã¢â‚¬Å“sings of hard times, infidelity, and other life lessons with total authority.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Sharon Jones and the Dap-KingsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ cover of Woody GuthrieÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬Å“This Land Is Your LandÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ was featured in the opening credits of the Oscar-nominated movie Up in the Air, and included on the soundtrack album.

Sharon had the time of her life during the sessions. Ã¢â‚¬Å“Oh, man. First off, it was the best piece of roast beef I ever ate,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ she enthuses. Ã¢â‚¬Å“But seriously, It was such an honor and a thrill to be at DarylÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s house and to get to make music, relax and have a good time. Everyone should visit.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½

Seattle native Allen Stone made his Live from DarylÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s House debut on the February installment of the series. He went from playing backwoods barbecues and community gatherings to selling out venues across the country, with a national TV appearance on Conan. He released his self-titled sophomore record in October on his own stickystones label, before it was re-released on ATO Records. The disc climbed the iTunes R&B/soul charts, peaking at #2, hitting #29 and #62 on BillboardÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Heatseekers and R&B/Hip-Hop Album charts. "What is there to say about Daryl Hall?Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ commented the 24-year-old. Ã¢â‚¬Å“The man is a legend. Getting the opportunity to be invited to sing with him was such an honor. I was overwhelmed at the experience to hang out with someone who has been so influential on my own career."
